en: <svg width='400' height='250' viewbox='0 0 375 220'><defs><marker id='arrowhead' markerWidth='10' markerHeight='7' refX='0' refY='2' orient='auto'><polygon points='0 0, 4 2, 0 4' /></marker></defs><line x1='20' y1='200' x2='200' y2='200' stroke='red' stroke-width='5' marker-end='url(#arrowhead)'></line><text x='110' y='220' class='small'>x: x (http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/millimetre) (x)</text><line x1='20' y1='200' x2='20' y2='20' stroke='green' stroke-width='5' marker-end='url(#arrowhead)'></line><text x='35' y='20' class='small'>y: y (http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/millimetre) (y)</text><line x1='20' y1='200' x2='190' y2='30' stroke='blue' stroke-width='5' marker-end='url(#arrowhead)'></line><text x='210' y='25' class='small'>z: z (http://www.ontology-of-units-of-measure.org/resource/om-2/millimetre) (z)</text></svg>
